definition[0]: the place in a computer email program where messages that you have not sent yet are stored
definition[1]: a container on an office desk that is used to hold letters, documents etc that have been dealt with and are ready to be taken away by someone such as a secretary
definition[2]: the place on a computer where email messages that you have not sent yet are stored
definition[3]: a flat container used to hold letters, papers etc that have been dealt with and are ready to be taken away
